words.source: H1961 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of הָיָה 'to be'; narrative marker; KJV 'And it came to pass', ESV 'On the day', NASB 'Now it came about'
H3117 prep. b- + noun common masculine singular of יוֹם 'day'; KJV 'on the day when', ESV 'on the day when', NASB 'on the day when'
H1696 Piel perfect 3ms of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'spake', ESV 'spoke', NASB 'spoke'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H4872 (מֹשֶׁה, 'Moses'), proper noun masculine; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Moses'
H776 prep. b- + noun common feminine singular construct of אֶרֶץ 'land, earth'; KJV 'in the land of', ESV 'in the land of', NASB 'in the land of'
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם, 'Egypt'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Egypt'
